All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppController
The main AppController to run E-Commerce application
AppShutdownHook
The type App shutdown hook serves as trigger to log info to logger that the application is shuting down
Cart
The Cart class represents a shopping cart that holds multiple CartItems.
CartController
Controller class for managing operations related to the shopping cart.
CartItem
The CartItem class represents an item in the shopping cart.
CartServiceImpl
Implementation of the ICartService interface, providing services for managing the shopping cart.
ECommerceController
The ECommerceController class manages the overall e-commerce application, coordinating between the main menu, product shelf, and shopping cart.
ICartService
Interface for managing the shopping cart operations.
InputCheck<T>
InputCheck class validates and cleans user input.
InputType
The enum Input type.
IProductService
The interface Product service.
LoadProductsData
Utility class to load products data from a JSON file.
MainMenuController
The type Main menu controller handles the main menu processes which returns an int value to ECommerceController
Measurement
The type Measurement.
PaymentOptions
The enum Payment options.
Product
The Product model contain attributes such as id, name, description, brand etc...
ProductServiceImpl
The type Product service.
ProductShelfController
The type Product shelf controller.
ProductShelfControllerTest
 
ShippingOptions
The enum Shipping options.
Unit
The enum Unit.
